data.title: 10 bästa hotellen närmast Varming Hanne Sigrid Undset i Kalundborg – recensioner, bilder och kartor
meta_keywords: Hotell nära Varming Hanne Sigrid Undset
data.meta_description: Upptäck hotell nära Varming Hanne Sigrid Undset i Kalundborg med verkliga hotellrecensioner, foton och kartor. Gratis avbokning på utvalda hotell och inga bokningsavgifter. Boka nu och få fantastiska erbjudanden med Trip.com!
data.text:
Located in Follenslev, Skortskær Bondegårdsferie is on the waterfront, within a 5-minute drive of Havnsø Marina and Havnsø Playground. This bed & breakfast is 2.2 mi (3.6 km) from Follenslev Kirke and 2.3 mi (3.8 km) from Nekselø Bugt. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities at this bed & breakfast include complimentary wireless internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include laundry facilities and a water dispenser. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 6 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided.

Visa mer

Located in Korsor, Musholm Ferie-Sport-Konference is within a 5-minute drive of Korsor Golf Club and Kultur & Medborgerhuset. This eco-certified hotel is 2 mi (3.3 km) from Korsor Bypark and 2.1 mi (3.4 km) from Halskov Church. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, an arcade/game room, and gift shops/newsstands. At Musholm Ferie-Sport-Konference, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Local cuisine breakfasts are available daily for a fee. Featured amenities include multilingual staff, laundry facilities, and a library. This hotel has 6 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite. Stay in one of 54 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished patios. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided.

Visa mer

Single-family house, built in 1967. 300 m from the sea. Private: property 1'200 m2, well-kept garden. Terrace (98 m2), parking at the house. Carport. Grocery 5.5 km. The owner does not accept any youth groups. "Fenya" - 300m from the sea", 4-room house 65 m2. Object suitable for 6 adults. Living room with 1 double sofabed and TV. 1 room with 1 double bed. Studio 1 room with with 1 double bed. Kitchen (oven, 3 induction hot plates, freezer). Shower/WC. Terrace 5 m2, roofed. Facilities: Internet (WiFi). Please note: non-smokers only. 326-7833

Visa mer

Single-family house, built in 2016. 100 m from the sea. Private: property 1'182 m2, well-kept garden. Outdoor shower, terrace (70 m2), barbecue. In the house: washing machine. Parking at the house. E-charging station. Grocery 5 km. The owner does not accept any youth groups. "Niesina" - 100m from the sea", 4-room house 125 m2. Object suitable for 8 adults + 1 child. Living room with TV. 1 room with 1 double bed. 1 room with 1 double bed. Studio 1 room with with 1 double sofabed and 1 x 2 bunk beds. Kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 induction hot plates, freezer). 2 showers/WC. Terrace 19 m2, roofed. View of the sea. Facilities: children's high chair, baby cot. Internet (WiFi). Please note: non-smokers only. Maximum 1 pet/ dog allowed. Bookings accepted for holiday purposes only. 326-8154

Visa mer

Single-family house, built in 1980. 450 m from the sea. Private: property 700 m2, well-kept garden. Barbecue, parking at the house. Grocery 4.9 km. The owner does not accept any youth groups. "Holga" - 450m from the sea", 2-room house 56 m2. Object suitable for 5 adults. Living room with TV. 1 room with 1 double bed. 1 room with 1 bed and 1 x 2 bunk beds. Kitchen (oven, 4 induction hot plates, freezer). Shower/WC. Terrace 18 m2, roofed. Facilities: Internet (WiFi). Please note: non-smokers only. Bookings accepted for holiday purposes only. 326-9055

Visa mer

Single-family house, built in 1969. 725 m from the sea. Private: property 1'357 m2, well-kept garden. Barbecue. In the house: tumble dryer. Parking at the house. E-charging station. Grocery 2.8 km. Golf course 6.2 km. The owner does not accept any youth groups. "Miona" - 725m from the sea", 2-room house 59 m2. Object suitable for 4 adults. Living room with TV. 1 room with 1 double bed. Studio 1 room with with 1 x 2 bunk beds. Kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 induction hot plates, microwave, freezer). Shower/WC. Terrace 10 m2, roofed. View of the sea. Facilities: Internet (WiFi). Please note: non-smokers only. Bookings accepted for holiday purposes only. 326-24996

Visa mer

Located in Horve, Dragsholm Slot is in a rural location, just a 4-minute walk from Dragsholm Slot and a 4-minute drive from Dragsholm Golf Club. This upscale hotel is 3.5 mi (5.6 km) from Lensbaron G.F. Zytphen Adeler and 7.9 mi (12.7 km) from Vesterlyng Strand. Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an attached winery and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. Enjoy local cuisine at Spisehuset, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary continental breakfast is served on weekdays. Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and 7 meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 34 individually decorated guestrooms. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Visa mer

Located in Jyderup, Bromølle Kro is in a rural location, within a 10-minute drive of Solyst Center For Kunst & Kultur and Jyderup Church. This hotel is 2.8 mi (4.6 km) from Buerup Kirke and 5.5 mi (8.9 km) from Aunso Kirke. Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access. Additional amenities at this hotel include tour/ticket assistance and a ballroom. At Bromølle Kro, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite. Stay in one of 30 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished patios. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have jetted bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Visa mer

Single-family house, built in 1971. 400 m from the sea. Private: natural state property 1'202 m2. Terrace (25 m2) (slide). In the house: trampoline, washing machine. Parking at the house. Grocery 2 km. The owner does not accept any youth groups. "Silke" - 400m from the sea", 3-room house 63 m2. Object suitable for 6 adults. Living room with TV and CD-player. 1 room with 1 double bed. 1 room with 1 double bed. 1 room with 1 x 2 bunk beds. Kitchen (oven, dishwasher, 4 induction hot plates, freezer). 2 showers/WC. Terrace 11 m2, roofed. Facilities: children's high chair. Internet (WiFi). Please note: non-smokers only. Maximum 1 pet/ dog allowed. Bookings accepted for holiday purposes only. 326-11099

Visa mer
